statements: SELECT * FROM accessibility_feedback
SELECT feedback, rating FROM accessibility_feedback
SELECT user_id, location_id, feedback, rating FROM accessibility_feedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT * FROM accessibility_feedback WHERE location_id = 123
SELECT user_id, rating FROM accessibility_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM accessibility_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY location_id DESC, user_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, location_id, feedback FROM accessibility_feedback WHERE rating < 2;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, location_id FROM accessibility_feedback WHERE rating >= 4 GROUP BY user_id, location_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY user_id, location_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM accessibility_feedback GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3 ORDER BY feedback_count DESC, user_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating, MIN(rating) AS lowest_rating, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM accessibility_feedback;
SELECT * FROM Accessibility_Features;
SELECT feature_name, description FROM Accessibility_Features;
SELECT feature_name, rating FROM Accessibility_Features, User_Feedback WHERE Accessibility_Features.feature_id = User_Feedback.feature_id;
SELECT * FROM User_Feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM User_Feedback GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM Accessibility_Features WHERE feature_id = 1;
SELECT feature_name, description FROM Accessibility_Features ORDER BY feature_name DESC;

SELECT User_Feedback.feedback_text, User_Feedback.rating, Accessibility_Features.feature_name FROM User_Feedback JOIN Accessibility_Features ON User_Feedback.feature_id = Accessibility_Features.feature_id WHERE User_Feedback.rating >= 4;

SELECT Accessibility_Features.description, COUNT(User_Feedback.feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM User_Feedback RIGHT JOIN Accessibility_Features ON User_Feedback.feature_id = Accessibility_Features.feature_id GROUP BY Accessibility_Features.feature_id HAVING total_feedback > 2 ORDER BY total_feedback DESC;

SELECT Users.user_id, User_Feedback.feedback_text, Accessibility_Features.feature_name FROM User_Feedback INNER JOIN Accessibility_Features ON User_Feedback.feature_id = Accessibility_Features.feature_id INNER JOIN Users ON User_Feedback.user_id = Users.user_id WHERE Users.user_id = 3 OR Users.user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM AccessibilityFeatures
SELECT feature_name, feature_description FROM AccessibilityFeatures
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM UserFeedback
SELECT feedback_id, user_id FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating > 4
SELECT feature_name, experience_details FROM AccessibilityFeatures JOIN ARExperiences ON AccessibilityFeatures.feature_id = ARExperiences.feature_id
SELECT * FROM AccessibilityFeatures WHERE feature_id = 1;
SELECT feature_name, feature_description FROM AccessibilityFeatures WHERE feature_name LIKE '%color%' ORDER BY feature_id DESC;

SELECT feature_name, feedback_text, rating FROM AccessibilityFeatures JOIN ARExperiences ON AccessibilityFeatures.feature_id = ARExperiences.feature_id JOIN UserFeedback ON ARExperiences.user_id = UserFeedback.user_id WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM ARExperiences WHERE experience_id < 10 ORDER BY user_id ASC, experience_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_experiences FROM ARExperiences GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM AccessibilityFeatures;
SELECT feature_name, description FROM AccessibilityFeatures;
SELECT feature_name, description FROM AccessibilityFeatures WHERE feature_name='Wheelchair Ramp';
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT Users.username, UserFeedback.rating FROM Users JOIN UserFeedback ON Users.user_id = UserFeedback.user_id;
SELECT * FROM AccessibilityFeatures;
SELECT feature_name, description FROM AccessibilityFeatures WHERE feature_id = 1;

SELECT Users.username, UserFeedback.rating, AccessibilityFeatures.feature_name FROM Users JOIN UserFeedback ON Users.user_id = UserFeedback.user_id JOIN AccessibilityFeatures ON UserFeedback.feature_id = AccessibilityFeatures.feature_id;

SELECT Users.username, ARExperiences.experience_description FROM Users JOIN ARExperiences ON Users.user_id = ARExperiences.user_id WHERE ARExperiences.date_created BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT feature_name, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM AccessibilityFeatures LEFT JOIN UserFeedback ON AccessibilityFeatures.feature_id = UserFeedback.feature_id GROUP BY feature_name ORDER BY feedback_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM accessibility_features;
SELECT feature_name, description FROM accessibility_features WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, feature_name FROM accessibility_features WHERE description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT user_id, feedback, rating FROM user_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT experience_name, description, accessibility_feature_id FROM ar_experiences JOIN accessibility_features ON ar_experiences.accessibility_feature_id = accessibility_features.id;
SELECT * FROM accessibility_features;
SELECT feature_name, description FROM accessibility_features WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, feedback, rating FROM user_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT experience_name, description, feature_name FROM ar_experiences JOIN accessibility_features ON ar_experiences.accessibility_feature_id = accessibility_features.id;

SELECT user_id, disability_name, feature_name FROM user_profile JOIN disabilities ON user_profile.disability_id = disabilities.id JOIN accessibility_features ON user_profile.accessibility_feature_id = accessibility_features.id;
